Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Greeting>Hoo hoo! If it isn't Link!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I am glad to see you safe and looking
so well.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I designed new training devices, but until
the blizzard subsides, there's no way I'll
be able to test them.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>All I can do is protect this place as best
I can.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>But don't worry about me. I have age and
wisdom on my side. Or age, at least.<sp:5:0:0>
Hoo hoo hoo!
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>As you may have heard, I retired from my
position as elder and entrusted the village
to Teba's leadership.<sp:5:0:0>
Now I spend my days here, at the Flight
Range, helping mold the next generation
of Rito warriors.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>I may look like an old fossil now, but I was
quite the warrior in my day! I would have
bested even Teba!
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Not so anymore though. <sp:5:0:0>Hoo hoo...
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Unfortunately, the equipment here has
been damaged in the blizzard.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>I would like to install new training devices,
but there's no telling when I'll be able to
actually do so.
Talk25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is a meaningful place for the Rito.
I feel a duty to protect it.
Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>That said, the most these old bones can
really manage is to prevent the Flight
Range from being buried in snow.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>That's why I have to keep this fire going.<sp:5:0:0>
Talk27:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>Spare some thought, though, for Teba
and the villagers.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0501>They are banding together admirably to
overcome this accursed blizzard. <sp:5:0:0>Yet I
can't help but worry.
<sp:3:0:2:0500>We can only hope the snows thaw soon.<sp:5:0:0>
Talk28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hoo hoo... <sp:5:1:0>That archery set is left over
from past training sessions.<sp:0:4:0>It's a shame they're simply collecting
dust, <sp:5:0:0>but I have no other plans for them.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>You seem like someone who could put
them to good use, Link. <sp:5:0:0>They're yours,
if you want them.
Near01: How long will this go on?
